summary: Order management app with tabs (Total Orders, Ready, Hallmark) featuring summary cards. Has partial quantity movement (splitting) between tabs.
architectural_notes: Total Weight must be calculated as qty × gross weight (gw) per line across all summary cards
Partial line splits must trigger summary card recalculation in both forward (split) and return directions
known_issues: Summary cards on Total Orders tab don't update when a line is partially split (forward path broken; return path works correctly)
Total Weight shows raw weight instead of qty×gw when qty is partially moved

existing_features.title: Fix Total Weight calculation across all tabs (Total Orders, Ready, Hallmark) so that weight is always computed as `qty × gross weight (gw)` per order line, not raw weight alone. For example, if a line has qty=3 and gw=8g, the weight contribution must be 24g, not 8g.

Fix summary cards on the Total Orders tab (and all other tabs) so they update correctly when a line is partially split. When 3 out of 4 qty are moved to Ready, the Total Orders summary cards must immediately reflect the reduced totals (count, weight=remaining_qty×gw, qty) for the remaining parent line, rather than staying unchanged. The fix must be symmetric: both the forward split path (move to Ready) and the return path (return from Ready) must recalculate all summary card values consistently.

projectName: Fix Total Weight calculation (qty×gw) and summary card update on partial split
